name: M'Toe's Adventure
description:
M'Toe is destined to be the next big mistletoe hero after his world was corrupt by an unknown evil. Battle through many unique enemies in many unique areas with your missiles and potions as you grasp purity across the land once again!

  • Use WASD+SPACE or ARROWS+X to play the game. Press T to view your task.
    • You can use the in-game pause menu by pressing TAB. There, controls can be toggled.
  • Use Q to place signs to chat with other M'Toes around the world!
  • Collect silver and level up to unlock more of the map.
    • Your silver can be spent in the shop to unlock new cosmetics.

This game has a built-in updating system so you can easily update your game if you are running on an older version. The only way you can access the shop and closet is if you are on the most recent version of the game.

Listen to the original soundtrack by efefski:
